title: mywaifus.ai | AI Waifus
keywords: AI Waifus, AI generated waifus, Waifu, make anime fusions and waifus with AI, custom anime waifus, furry, anime
introduction: MyWaifus.ai is a platform that allows users to create and customize their own waifus, virtual characters, and interact with them.
features: Access to various add-ons for additional features

faqs.question: Is MyWaifus.ai free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, MyWaifus.ai is free to use with optional paid add-ons for additional features.

faqs.question: What can I do on MyWaifus.ai?
faqs.answer: You can create and customize your own virtual characters, interact with them, and access various add-ons for additional features.
